title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a calculator chatbot.It should ask the user to enter any two numbers and an arithmetic operation such as add,subtract,multiply or divide.The chatbot should show the result.The user may choose to do another calculation or exit the program
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
